main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing luminous spherical objects and lights in the sky during an electrical storm on August 11, 1965, in Richmond, Walnut Creek, California.
interesting points: Mr. Mathews observed two silvery-white spherical objects maneuvering over his residence for about 5 minutes., These objects were described as being under intelligent control., Mr. Gates from the Morrison Planetarium saw lights creating an illusion of dancing due to reflected moonlight., The views were observed during a rare and intense electrical storm., No photographs were taken despite multiple reports confirming the sightings.
witness description: Mr. A. B. Mathews, a 42-year-old civil engineer; Mr. Gatas, manager of the Morrison Planetarium
